block.blockbeats.sound_player.locked: This block has been locked by it's owner.
gui.blockbeats.playlist_screen.title: Sound Player Playlist
gui.blockbeats.playlist_screen.descripti: Select and upload new files for your playlist.
Settings in which area, relative to this block, players should hear the sounds.
General playback settings, e.g. volume, pitch and other options.
When locked, only the owner of the block can adjust its settings.
gui.blockbeats.sound_properties.title: File Properties
gui.blockbeats.rename_file.title: Rename File
gui.blockbeats.upload_file.title: Upload Sound File
gui.blockbeats.share.title: Share Sound File With
gui.blockbeats.share.stop_share_descript: Stops sharing the sound file with all players.
gui.blockbeats.playback_config.title: Playback Configuration
gui.blockbeats.playback_config.descripti: The distance in blocks over which the sound becomes quieter until it can no longer be heard.
When activated, the sounds are played as background music and are therefore independent of world position, attenuation distance and other position-related influences.
When enabled, the "Now playing" label will be displayed above the hotbar (like with jukeboxes)
gui.blockbeats.playback_area.title: Playback Area Settings
gui.blockbeats.file_info.title: Title
gui.blockbeats.browser.title: File Browser
gui.blockbeats.browser.description_all: Uploaded sound files from all players that you are allowed to see.
gui.blockbeats.browser.description_my_co: Only the sound files uploaded by you.
gui.blockbeats.browser.description_share: All sound files that have been shared with you.
gui.blockbeats.browser.description_favor: The sound files that are in your favorites list and you like the most.
gui.blockbeats.delete.title: Delete File
gui.blockbeats.delete.instruction: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"? This cannot be undone!
enum.blockbeats.sound_visibility.info.pr: Only you can see and edit the sound file.
enum.blockbeats.sound_visibility.info.sh: Everyone can see the sound file, but only you can edit it.
enum.blockbeats.sound_visibility.info.pu: Everyone can see and edit the sound file.
A circular area around the source in which all players can hear the sounds.
A box area in which the players can hear the sounds by using two relative coordinates.
Everyone riding the specified entities in the given radius will hear the sounds.
enum.blockbeats.playback_area_type.descr: Method to define the playback area.
enum.blockbeats.redstone_mode.info.no_re: The block cannot be controlled by redstone and must be turned on or off manually.
enum.blockbeats.redstone_mode.info.redst: The block is active as long as a redstone signal is present.
The block is started by a redstone pulse and then remains active.
enum.blockbeats.shuffle_mode.info.no_shu: All tracks are played in the order given.
enum.blockbeats.loop_mode.info.no_loop: The block will be deactivated once the playlist has been played.
enum.blockbeats.loop_mode.info.loop: The playlist runs in a continuous loop until the block is deactivated.
enum.blockbeats.loop_mode.info.single_lo: The current track is playing in a continuous loop.
